org.spongepowered.api.event.weather

Interface WeatherChangeEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event, GameEvent, WeatherEvent

    public interface WeatherChangeEvent
extends WeatherEvent
    Called when a world's weather changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Weather getInitialWeather()
      Gets the Weather that was happening before this event.
      Weather getResultingWeather()
      Gets the Weather that this event is creating.
      void setResultingWeather(Weather weather)
      Sets what the new Weather should be with a random duration.
      void setResultingWeather(Weather weather, int duration)
      Sets what the new Weather should be with a given duration.

    • Method Detail

      • getInitialWeather

        Weather getInitialWeather()
        Gets the Weather that was happening before this event.
        Returns:
        The Weather before the event was called

      • getResultingWeather

        Gets the Weather that this event is creating.
        Returns:

        void setResultingWeather(Weather weather,
                         int duration)
        Sets what the new Weather should be with a given duration.
        Parameters:
        weather - The new Weather
        duration - The duration of the weather in ticks
